class.name: PLATEAUTileCoordinate
class.brief_description: Map tile coordinate (column, row, zoom level).
class.description: PLATEAUTileCoordinate represents a tile coordinate in the XYZ tile system used by GSI and other map tile servers. [b]Note:[/b] On mobile platforms (iOS/Android), this class is fully available. The [method get_extent] method requires libplateau and will return an empty Dictionary on mobile.

method.name: get_extent
method.description: Returns the latitude/longitude extent for this tile as a Dictionary with min_lat, min_lon, max_lat, max_lon keys. [b]Note:[/b] This method is not supported on mobile platforms (Android/iOS) and will return an empty Dictionary.
